alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Heard (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Haralson, Carroll, Heard and southwestern Coweta Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Centralhatchee, or 8 miles north of Franklin, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Franklin, Bremen, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Corinth, Bowdon Junction, Tyus, Powers Crossroads, Roosterville, Handy, Waresville, Clem, Frolona, Abilene, and John Tanner State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
